channel.title: Posts on Zcash Ecosystem Security
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Zcash Ecosystem Security

item.title: October Update: Ywallet audited, and what's next?
item.description: Hi Zcash fans! It’s time for the first monthly update on the Zcash Ecosystem Security grant. This October, we saw the completion of a full security audit of Ywallet. Ywallet’s fast scanning algorithm makes it an attractive option for users facing long delays due to the recent high usage of the Zcash blockchain. It had also received the least security review among the Zcash wallets, so we decided to prioritize it as the first project to be audited for this grant.

item.title: Hello, World!
item.description: Hi! This is where I will be posting be posting updates on the Zcash Ecosystem Security grant project!
